record.title: RECESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that all time be yielded back and that the Senate now stand in recess until 2:15 p.m.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
Thereupon, the Senate, at 12:26 p.m., recessed until 2:15 p.m. and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Mr. CARPER).
The Senator from Vermont is recognized.
